name: Viva Labs
headline: Winning Video Ads with AI
description: Viva Labs makes winning video ad creatives with AI. We help brands and marketing agencies brainstorm ideas for ad creatives, generate the creatives, and optimize them based on performance data.
tags: industry:artificial-intelligence; industry:social-media; industry:video; industry:marketing; industry:advertising; location:san-francisco-bay-area

founders.name: Vishal Jain, Founder
founders.description: Harvard '19, Bachelors & Masters in CS. Formerly an engineer at Microsoft, Cohesity, & Clumio.

Contact UsContact Us
![](https://framerusercontent.com/images/6tTbkXggWgQCAJ4DO2QEdXXmgM.svg)![](https://framerusercontent.com/images/11KSGbIZoRSg4pjdnUoif6MKHI.svg)
Trusted by Leading Brands and Agencies
  * ![](https://framerusercontent.com/images/0rHiS9ww7diL1ntrs7bBG2AnMGw.png)
  * ![](https://framerusercontent.com/images/DpWarjYR0bMpQb8kxGgA3p4os8E.png)

### URL to Viral UGC Ads in Minutes
![](https://framerusercontent.com/images/9KkAtrPlhentiZcWGE7nRxZrAM.png?scale-down-to=4096)
![](https://framerusercontent.com/images/9KkAtrPlhentiZcWGE7nRxZrAM.png?scale-down-to=4096)
![](https://framerusercontent.com/images/9KkAtrPlhentiZcWGE7nRxZrAM.png?scale-down-to=4096)
![](https://framerusercontent.com/images/9KkAtrPlhentiZcWGE7nRxZrAM.png?scale-down-to=4096)
###### Write Your Script
Our AI researches your product and generates dozens of ad script variations. Use our scripts or write your own!
![](https://framerusercontent.com/images/qaS2I9UsOgMq5w7BWRJESiU4E8.png?scale-down-to=2048)
![](https://framerusercontent.com/images/qaS2I9UsOgMq5w7BWRJESiU4E8.png?scale-down-to=2048)
![](https://framerusercontent.com/images/qaS2I9UsOgMq5w7BWRJESiU4E8.png?scale-down-to=2048)
![](https://framerusercontent.com/images/qaS2I9UsOgMq5w7BWRJESiU4E8.png?scale-down-to=2048)
###### Select an AI Influencer
Choose from 100+ realistic AI avatars to represent your brand. Our state of the art voices span 29+ languages for global reach.
![](https://framerusercontent.com/images/kuoH0sCncSmRqKycRIy26IMsHk.png?scale-down-to=2048)
![](https://framerusercontent.com/images/kuoH0sCncSmRqKycRIy26IMsHk.png?scale-down-to=2048)
![](https://framerusercontent.com/images/kuoH0sCncSmRqKycRIy26IMsHk.png?scale-down-to=2048)
![](https://framerusercontent.com/images/kuoH0sCncSmRqKycRIy26IMsHk.png?scale-down-to=2048)
###### Generate your Ads
Our AI selects optimal B-roll clips, captions, animations, and layouts. Refine your ad variations in our flexible video editor.
![](https://framerusercontent.com/images/VhVVr4HzrSDAtgw52KO452g6OoQ.png)
![](https://framerusercontent.com/images/VhVVr4HzrSDAtgw52KO452g6OoQ.png)
![](https://framerusercontent.com/images/VhVVr4HzrSDAtgw52KO452g6OoQ.png)
![](https://framerusercontent.com/images/VhVVr4HzrSDAtgw52KO452g6OoQ.png)
### A/B Test Variations
Discovering winning ads often involves rigorous experimentation. Generate dozens of ad variants with different scripts, avatars, B-roll clips. 
Discovering winning ads often involves rigorous experimentation. Generate dozens of ad variants with different scripts, avatars, B-roll clips. 
Discovering winning ads often involves rigorous experimentation. Generate dozens of ad variants with different scripts, avatars, B-roll clips. 
### Competitor Ad Spying
Leverage ads from competitors or from companies targeting similar audiences to bootstrap your ideation. We provide comprehensive analysis telling you exactly what the ads do well and do poorly.
![](https://framerusercontent.com/images/QnnrTuyeTfpDyWlt78jBJFBVkM.png)
![](https://framerusercontent.com/images/QnnrTuyeTfpDyWlt78jBJFBVkM.png)

![](https://framerusercontent.com/images/MrzWGU7d2SDr58WtidoeyHfz8k.png)
### Optimize Creatives
We analyze your creatives, ad metrics, and target audiences to to deliver data-driven optimizations that boost performance.
We analyze your creatives, ad metrics, and target audiences to to deliver data-driven optimizations that boost performance.
We analyze your creatives, ad metrics, and target audiences to to deliver data-driven optimizations that boost performance.
### Hear from our customers
Courtney, Brand Owner
Game changer! As a small brand, we were burning so much time and money hiring UGC actors and coordinating shoots. Now I can generate multiple ad versions in minutes!
Jake, Agency Director
You guys are really onto something! I was skeptical of how good AI videos could be, but you have the best lip sync and voices out there. Great quality creatives and awesome customer support!
Ann, Creative Strategist
Love your competitor reports - I take away a new creative idea every time I look at them :)

generated_description:
**Viva Labs: Revolutionizing Video Advertising with AI**

Founded in 2023 and based in San Francisco, Viva Labs is taking the world of video advertising by storm. As a part of the Y Combinator Batch W22, this dynamic startup specializes in creating winning video ads through advanced AI technology. Their mission? To help brands and marketing agencies brainstorm, generate, and optimize viral video ad creatives effortlessly.

**What They Do:**
Viva Labs streamlines the video ad creation process. Their platform allows users to generate engaging ad scripts, select from over 100 realistic AI avatars, and utilize state-of-the-art voices in 29 different languages. They take the grunt work out of video production, letting users create multiple ad versions in minutes, rather than weeks, while still delivering high-quality outputs.

**Key Features:**
1. **Script Generation:** AI analyzes your products and crafts a variety of ad scripts, saving you time and effort.
2. **AI Avatars:** Pick from a wide array of AI avatars to represent your brand in a way that resonates with your audience.
3. **Ad Creation Flexibility:** With a robust video editor, you can fine-tune your ads by choosing optimal visuals, animations, captions, and layouts.
4. **Performance Optimization:** The platform continuously analyzes ad metrics to provide data-driven insights, helping you iterate and improve your campaigns.
5. **Streamlined Testing:** Generate multiple ad variants for A/B testing without the usual hassles.

**Customer Testimonies:**
Viva Labs has already garnered attention from various brands and agencies. Customers rave about the efficiency of the platform, with comments highlighting its potential to transform how small businesses create video content. One user aptly noted it was a "game-changer" in saving time and resources.

**Pricing Structure:**
Viva Labs offers a tiered pricing model, starting from a free plan with access to basic features, to comprehensive packages designed for growth and enterprise needs. The plans cater to diverse budgets, from $0 to custom solutions for larger businesses.

**Team and Background:**
With a compact team of four, Viva Labs is led by visionary minds eager to innovate in the marketing space. Partnered with influential figures like NAN, their potential for growth appears significant.

For more information on how to enhance your video advertising strategy with cutting-edge AI, visit [Viva Labs](https://www.vivalabs.ai/). If you’re ready to elevate your brand's video presence, it’s time to get started.

In summary, if you’re looking to tap into the future of advertising, Viva Labs is worth a closer look. They aren’t just changing the game; they’re rewriting the rules.
